description: President Obama said at a news conference that while he would continue to pressure Russia, he did not foresee a “military confrontation between Russia and the United States.”
title: Obama on Russian Culpability in Ukraine
title_page: Obama on Russian Culpability in Ukraine - Video - NYTimes.com
text: President Obama said at a news conference that while he would continue to pressure Russia, he did not foresee a “military confrontation between Russia and the United States.”
